INDI driver for QHY CCD cameras
Copyright (c) 2013 Cloudmakers, s. r. o. All Rights Reserved.

QHY5 INDI Driver is based on code by Jasem Mutlaq
Copyright(c) 2012 Jasem Mutlaq. All rights reserved.

The driver code is based on QHY CCD SDK for Linux (lzr@qhyccd.com)
Copyright (C) 2013 QHYCCD Inc. All rights reserved.

Firmware code is published on http://qhyccd.com/ccdbbs/index.php
Copyright (C) 2013 QHYCCD Inc. All rights reserved.

Firmware upload code is based on FXLOAD by Stephen Williams, David Brownell, Roger Williams
Copyright (c) 2001 Stephen Williams (steve@icarus.com)
Copyright (c) 2001-2002 David Brownell (dbrownell@users.sourceforge.net)

All rights reserved.
